body.description: Support your immune system and support your overall health with Optimum Nutrition Opti-Men Daily Multivitamin specially formulated for active men. This men's daily multivitamin contains 21 essential vitamins and minerals, including Vitamin C, Zinc, Vitamin D, Vitamin E and Vitamin B12, to support your immune system, support cellular energy and metabolism, and promote overall wellness. Optimum Nutrition Opti-Men daily multivitamin for men includes botanical extracts that can be built on through consumption of a healthy, balanced diet, plus one gram of free form amino acids. Each bottle contains a 80-day supply of 240 Opti-Men multivitamin tablets to help provide immune systems and nutrients for active men. Take 3 tablets with food. There’s more of you in you. Optimum Nutrition has been trusted to provide high quality in post-workout recovery, pre-workout energy, and on-the-go sports nutrition for over 35 years and in 90+ countries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Comprehensive Boost to Health and Vitality!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Optimum Nutrition's Opti-Men Multi-vitamins have truly become an essential part of my daily routine. From the moment I started taking these, I've experienced a remarkable improvement in my overall well-being.What sets these vitamins apart is the incredible array of essential nutrients they provide. The impressive blend of vitamins and minerals covers all the bases, ensuring that my body receives the support it needs to function at its best. I love knowing that I'm giving my body a comprehensive boost with each dose.Not only do these vitamins contain a wide range of nutrients, but their effectiveness is also noteworthy. I've noticed increased energy levels, improved focus, and a greater sense of vitality since incorporating Opti-Men into my regimen. It's evident that the carefully chosen combination of ingredients is working synergistically to enhance my health.One of the standout features is the convenience of a single daily serving. The thoughtfully formulated tablet eliminates the need for multiple pills, making it incredibly easy to stick to the routine. The coated tablets go down smoothly without any aftertaste, which is a definite plus.Another aspect I appreciate is the brand's commitment to quality. Optimum Nutrition is a trusted name in the industry, and their dedication to producing high-quality supplements is evident in every aspect of these multi-vitamins. The careful sourcing of ingredients and rigorous testing provide peace of mind that I'm consuming a product that meets the highest standards.In conclusion, Optimum Nutrition's Opti-Men Multi-vitamins are a game-changer for anyone looking to take charge of their health. The abundance of essential vitamins and minerals, coupled with their proven effectiveness, makes them an exceptional choice. Since starting to take these vitamins, I've felt a positive difference in my overall health, energy, and well-being. I can confidently give these vitamins a resounding five-star rating and recommend them to anyone seeking a convenient and effective way to support their health journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best men's multi-vitamin I've ever used. However...
reviews.reviewText: These vitamins are hands down the best men's multi-vitamin I've ever used and I prefer them over GNC Mega Men (my old standby) as they're just more effective for me. I can feel an immediate energy boost and definitely can tell the days I've missed taking them. The packaging suggest taking three, but I only take two and feel like that's extremely effective for me (to be honest three just didn't seemed excessive to me).There are some caveats to this vitamin I feel I should mention, yes it's fantastic and I find it extremely effective. However, the vitamins themselves smell absolutely terrible (do not under any circumstances open the bottle and inhale the smell, it will straight offend your nose). Secondly, they don't taste any better than they smell either. Fortunately the taste doesn't linger for long and you can just pop the tablet(s) in with a mouthful of water and gulp them and that helps. I also think the smell and taste gets worse the closer to empty the bottle gets. That said, I've had no ill effects from the pills at all. I just think they taste and smell horrific, but I didn't buy them for their smell or taste so I can live with that.Overall, I would recommend these to anyone looking for a high quality men's multi-vitamin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Mega Multivitamin at a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I had been taking a different mega multivitamin for years, but the price kept going up and it wasn't in stock, so I looked at what this vitamin had and found it comparable, so I tried it.A few months later, I'm getting great benefits. I spend a good amount of money on supplements and a great multivitamin is critical to my mental and physical health. This one is packed with lots of great ingredients, including lot of quality B vitamins. When my B vitamin intake is good, I sleep better, have more energy, think more clearly and just generally feel better.I can tell the difference when I'm not getting what I need. This multivitamin is definitely working for me and I'm even saving a little money, so I'm sticking with this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great stuff. A complete vitamin. It made me feel better in many aspects of my life. They just don’t give you enough. It’s a little pricey compared to alternatives.
Bought 240tablets in Aug 2023, only to realise that the bottle expires in Nov 2023!! How do you expect me to finish 240 tablets in 3 months?
Love the brand, and the concentration of elements in it. I normally take 2 daily with food, and it makes a huge difference in overall feeling and nutrition.
I feel more active and better after using for 2 months. Putting 3 star because I don't understand why 300% of regular intake is equal to one serving.
This gave me a bad case of vitamin b6 toxicity, please avoid this product!!!
